subdisciplines.name: Child Development
subdisciplines.description: The study of how children's physical, cognitive, and emotional development occurs from birth through adolescence.

subdisciplines.name: Adolescent Development
subdisciplines.description: The study of how young people develop from childhood to adulthood, including physical, cognitive, and social-emotional changes.

subdisciplines.name: Gerontology
subdisciplines.description: The study of aging and the effects it has on individuals, including physical, cognitive, and social-emotional changes.
